DOC.brief_summary: To test hypothesis regimen 200 mg oral mifepristone , option home administration , follow 800 μg buccal misoprostol 24 hour later abortion 70 day LMP feasible acceptable Singapore .
DOC.criteria: Have intrauterine pregnancy consistent wit gestational age ≤ 70 day Be 21 year age Be willing able sign consent form Be eligible abortion accord current hospital guideline Be able return clinic able contact study staff emergency medical service need Be willing provide address , email and/or telephone number purpose followup Agree comply study procedure visit schedule confirm suspected ectopic pregnancy undiagnosed adnexal mass chronic renal failure concurrent longterm corticosteroid therapy history inherit porphyrias IUD place ( must remove mifepristone administer ) .
